name: OscillatorNode.setPeriodicWave
description: The setPeriodicWave() method of the OscillatorNode interface is used to point to a PeriodicWave defining a periodic waveform that can be used to shape the oscillator's output, when type is custom.

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'setPeriodicWave' in the 'Web Audio API' specification.
